data.text: @SEIU @SecMartyWalsh Are you for firing unvaccinated healthcare workers?

@SEIU @ninaturner @SecMartyWalsh Honestly, a huge part of this is that COVID mainly only has a high morbidity rate for the disabled community and we are not seen as human in this society. It doesn't help that already marginalized groups are more likely to be disabled.
@SEIU @ninaturner @SecMartyWalsh Cause we are on our own. Love your neighbors.
